WO-IMPL-FINANCIAL-INTEGRITY-FIX.title: M2 Monetary Ledger Integrity Fix: Boundary-Crossing Transfer Tracking
WO-IMPL-FINANCIAL-INTEGRITY-FIX.instruction_raw:
Execute the 3 action items from the attached audit report:
1. In SettlementSystem.transfer(), add M2-boundary detection: if sender is NON_M2 and receiver is M2, call record_monetary_expansion. If sender is M2 and receiver is NON_M2, call record_monetary_contraction.
2. In SettlementSystem._create_transaction_record(), force executed=True for money_creation and money_destruction transaction types.
3. In TransactionProcessor, register money_creation and money_destruction as explicit No-Op types to eliminate warnings.
Run pytest after changes to ensure no regressions.
